sentences.cn: ... 装饰着五颜六色小饰物的圣诞树。

sentences.en: A bauble is a showy ornament of little value.
sentences.cn: 廉价珠宝是华而不实的装饰品.

sentences.en: A fool should never hold a bauble in his hand.
Afool should never hold a bauble in his hand.
Learning is a scepter to some, a bauble to others.
sentences.cn: 学识对某些人是权杖, 对另一些人只是漂亮的装饰品.

sentences.en: Take away that shining bauble there, and lock up the doors.
sentences.cn: 赶快拿走那些华丽而不中用的把戏, 把门锁上.

sentences.en: That little bauble is not to be compared with ( not to ) this enormous jewel.
sentences.cn: 那个汹设不能与 ( 不是 ) 这个大宝石相比较.

sentences.en: That little bauble is not to be compared with this enormous jewel.
sentences.cn: 那个小摆设不能与这个大宝石相比较.

sentences.en: The child was delighted with the bauble she had won in the grab bag.
sentences.cn: 这孩子非常喜欢摸彩袋赢得的那个小玩意儿.
丑角挥动手中拿着的木棒.

sentences.en: To David, this was not just one more bauble in an already overcrowded jewelry box. Rather, this was his love displayed on my arm for all the world to see.
sentences.cn: 对戴维来说，这个不仅仅是一个装在拥挤的首饰盒中的小玩意，而是一个向世界宣布他对我的爱，戴在我手臂的爱。

trans.tran_cn: 小玩意，华而不实的小件装饰品，无价值的东西，丑角的手杖
